title: The First Men
body: The First Men, known in history as Mant Kuzzo, Mant Nukko, and Mant Tummo, are the three great rulers who built empires, using their Spiritual powers to conquer and rule.
preface: The term “First Men” is used to refer to the first Humans who gained knowledge of the Spirits and used them in pursuit of the quest given to them, by the Spirits, to save Heru from its ultimate doom. It is not known, in the records of the Temples and other libraries, that it was the Spirits who reached out to the chosen. Rather, it is thought that it was the gifted who felt the presence of the Spirits and reached out to them, but this is false.
